nodes.text: The Red Asteroid Bar was a cantina located on R-Duba, a minor trading planet. There, a cloaked figure hired Kirk Windjammer, captain of the anti-grav loader Seaskimmer, to deliver an illegal shipment of blasters to a Dorande fleet on the open sea.

The Red Asteroid Bar first appeared in Droids 5, the fifth issue of the Star Wars Legends Star Wars: Droids comic series published by Star Comics, an imprint of Marvel Comics, which was first published on December 1, 1986.
